name: Train Defender Lite
description: Terrorists hijacked three trains- ALASKA EXPRESS, ARIZONA EXPRESS and NEW YORK EXPRESS!!! You have to save thousands of tormented passengers with your valour, celerity and dexterity. Brutal enemies equipped with lethal weapons challenge you to rescue the hostages. Go.... and demonstrate exceptional courage and skills with raging and revitalizing powers in hand to clear death dealing three levels. Accomplishing victory at each level entitle you as “THE DEFENDER”.
